description:
Flexible Family Living On ½ An Acre!
Here is a perfect opportunity to purchase a home that offers so many living options for you and your family.
Nestled in a quiet pocket of Cockatoo, this
acre property has all bases covered with a 3 bedroom home PLUS 3 separate fully insulated cottages!
The split level home has built in robes to all bedrooms, updated family bathroom and semi-ensuite to the master.
The lower level consists of the master bedroom and family room which has gas heating and a Coonara to keep you warm on cold nights plus there is split system heating and cooling for the summer months.
The upper level contains the remaining two bedrooms, family bathroom, study alcove, meals area and kitchen which has a perfect view of the yard and covered entertaining area.
The fully fenced back yard has the three cottages (with carpet and power) only a short distance from the house, which would be ideal for use as a teenagers retreat/bedroom, work from home office, art studio's, guest accommodation or extra storage - the list is endless.
Whatever the need, this property has got it covered!
An inspection is a must - call today!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

MODERN MAKEOVER...
Overlooking Puffing Billy tracks and native greenery this modern 3 bedroom cedar home is sure to impress. Freshly renovated to an exacting standard you will love the fact that you can move in and enjoy this home without having to upgrade a thing! This immaculate home offers open plan living with modern colours and fittings, renovated bathroom and kitchen that includes a new dishwasher and oven.
You will be comfortable all in any season with the gas ducted heating, coonara and split system air conditioner.
Entertaining will be easy on the deck that overlooks your own private paradise or you can enjoy BBQ's all year round underneath the rotunda which offers privacy away from neighbours.
The whole family will love living here as it is located within easy access to the school, shops, transport and sporting facilities and has the bonus of a sealed driveway and storage shed. With abundant bird life and peaceful surrounds, you will wonder why it has taken you so long to make your move to the hills.
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

A Perfect Start!
Whether you are looking for your first home or an investment property this solid brick home will be ideal for you!
Located in a quiet part of town on a no through road, you can walk to the shops, primary school, public transport and sporting facilities.
The surprisingly spacious home features two separate living areas, huge kitchen with walk in pantry, dining area and includes gas ducted heating throughout the home.
There is plenty of storage with built in robes to both bedrooms, double linen cupboards in the laundry and double storage in the entrance.
The backyard is complete with covered entertaining area where you can sit back and admire your fully fenced and usable 1/4 acre block! What are you waiting for...call for an inspection today!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Close to everything on a 1/4 acre
Situated in the heart of town on 1/4 of an acre, is this perfectly presented home, ideal for the family. The property features plenty of flat, grassed area for the kids to run around and a 2 car garage, while the house features 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a well-appointed kitchen with adjoined meals area, gas heating and air-conditioning and timber floors. With a short walk to the shops, school and public transport, this home offers something for everyone. Call today to arrange inspection.
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

What a 'cracker'! Immaculate house on flat land
Sale by Set Date 21/6/2011
Immaculate is the appropriate description of this 3 bedroom plus study home.
The home comes complete with 3 robed bedrooms (master with ensuite and huge Walk in Robe), study, large lounge
plus dining area and up to the minute renovated kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, Bosch appliances and soft closing '2 pack' doors.
Other features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, polished floor boards and a powered bungalow.
Outside features include a large deck, beautiful flat grassy areas and kids playground all on a 1/4 acre (approx.).
You can move in and not touch a thing.
He who hesitates will miss this one!!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

The Ultimate Entertainer On ½ An Acre!
This home has been designed with the growing family in mind, with plenty of living space for everyone.
Stretch out across the spacious home that boasts the very best in zoned living, the family room is complete with open fire place and air conditioning, plus there is a large second living area or rumpus room at the other end of the house.
The kitchen is central to the home and is feature packed with glass splash-backs, dishwasher, breakfast bar, an enormous walk in pantry and adjoining meals area.
Nicely spread out from each other all four bedrooms have built in robes, the master with walk in robe and ensuite.
Entertain your friends and family all year round on the covered entertaining area where you are surrounded by privacy and spectacular views of the Warburton Ranges - there is also a built in bar with sink which is perfect for summer BBQ's or parties!
There is just over
an acre of manicured gardens surrounding the home plus workshop, kids cubby house, ample storage, double carport, sealed driveway and gas ducted heating throughout the home.
This home is a must see!
Please note that open for inspection times may change/ be canceled please confirm all times with agent.
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Flattest Block in Cockatoo plus Triple garage!
Sale by Set Date 21/6/2011
Is this the flattest block in Cockatoo?
This gorgeous quarter acre allotment is perfectly located in a quiet street.
Featuring large lawn area, ready made driveway, triple sized garage with two remote controlled roller door access and concrete floor plus power, garden shed and tank, all you need to do is build your dream house (S.T.C.A)!
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

Let The Good Times Begin!
This is the country escape that you have been dreaming of!
Set back off the road, the cedar weatherboard home has more to offer than first meets the eye.
Filled with character and warmth you will feel right at home as soon as you walk in the front door.
Your family can spread out across the surprisingly spacious home which features 4 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, open study or second living area, updated family bathroom and a huge family room.
There are cathedral ceilings, dado paneling and gas ducted heating throughout the home, plus the bonus of a split system in the family room.
Entertain family and friends all year round underneath the covered entertaining area which provides a perfect view of the whole garden, where you can watch the kids play on the fully fenced and usable
acre (approx).
The home has solar electricity, which not only helps the environment - but will reduce your electricity bills!
Offering sealed road access and located close to schools, shops, public transport and the school bus - make sure you don't miss this opportunity to live your country dream!
Justin O'Hehir : 0404 405 225

Double The Living - Double The Lifestyle On Over 1 Acre
Sale by Set Date 10/5/2011
Whether you are looking for a dual occupancy home for the in-laws or one big enough to fit in the whole family, don't let this one pass you by!
Set on 1 and 1/3 acres, this property offers flat usable areas, above ground pool with solar heating, 3 dog runs, mini orchard and plenty of space for kids to play for hours on end.
The upper level of the home has large kitchen with new dishwasher and adjoining meals area that overlooks the family room, family bathroom with separate toilet, 4 bedrooms two with built in robes and the third with a huge walk in robe.
The master suite comes complete with air conditioner, walk in robe and double shower in the ensuite.
The surprisingly spacious ground floor has a huge master bedroom with built in robes, bathroom and utility room, and two living areas with direct access to the garden.
Other features include gas central heating, wrap around verandah's, external laundry (under roofline), garden shed, 9,000 litre water tank, double carport and all services are connected. Bring the in-laws along for an inspection today!
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Presenting 'Lavender Cottage'
'Character' cannot fully describe this lovely 2/3 bedroom home.
One of the original Cockatoo cottages, the property comes complete with large timber country style kitchen including dishwasher and meals area overlooking the lounge with wood heater.
The two bedrooms upstairs are serviced by the bathroom with separate toilet.
Downstairs is a laundry and utility room which is currently used as a guest room.
Sit down in the evenings on the deck and enjoy the views across the valley whilst out the back there is plenty of flat areas in the tiered yard to garden, play or do what ever you like.
Other features include polished floorboards, cooling, gas ducted heating, single carport plus another car spot, high ceilings, chook pen with run all on a usable 1/4 acre block (approx).
He who hesitates will miss this one!!
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

Entertainers Delight
Welcome to your new home, a delightful character home nestled in a quiet cul-de-sac providing you with the perfectly peaceful lifestyle you are looking for. The stunning home features gleaming polished floorboards, timber kitchen with dishwasher, 3 large bedrooms, split system heating /cooling, plus cosy gas ducted heating to ensure this winter is enjoyed in total comfort. Outside you will discover a fully fenced and useable allotment of approximately a 1/4 acre with established low maintenance gardens, double carport, magnificent covered decked entertaining area and a large paved courtyard perfect for family BBQs or relaxing in the sun. All of this within walking distance to the shops, public transport, sporting ground & school. Call today inspection is a must.
Photo ID Required
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Big Garage on a Flat 1/4 acre (approx.)
This all round property would be ideally suited to perhaps first home buyers or even investors (with a tenant currently paying $260pw).
Boys with their toys will be very pleased to have a lovely house attached to this great garage too! Situated on a lovely flat 1/4acre (967m2 approx) in a quiet part of town the home consists of 3 bedrooms (1 with built in robes), central bathroom, open plan living alongside the kitchen/meals area.
Out the back is where the action is with a terrific deck overlooking the large flat and grassy block and nearby an oversized double garage complete with wood heater.
Other features include gas ducted heating plus wood heater, beautiful polished floorboards, plus rear access to the near flat, low maintenance block.
Privately positioned close to shops and Cockatoo Primary be quick or miss out!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 68 45 22 to arrange an inspection.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

For The Astute Investor!!!
Boasting main street frontage the property is zoned business 1, is tenanted and returns $1265.00 PCM plus out goings. The building is 110m2 and offers floating timber floors, kitchen, large open plan shop, 2 rooms plus a storage room, toilet and basin, gas heating and a large common area at the rear for parking. Call today an inspection is a must.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Character & Charm on ½ Acre
You will feel right at home as you enter this wonderfully appointed mud brick character home. With duel road access & potential for subdivision (STCA) this property offers so much more than its stunning street appeal suggests. With two large bedrooms both with robes, rustic kitchen & spacious living area this home is sure to impress. A large under roof garage allows for an easy extension (STCA) or a double lock up garage that features plenty of storage space for the home handyman.
Other features include gas heating, freshly sealed mud bricks, cathedral ceilings, established gardens & a large backyard. Inspection will not disappoint!
Justin O'Hehir : 0404 405 225

Best Value In Cockatoo!
Sale by Set Date 19/4/2011
Perfect for first home buyers, investors or downsizers, this home is located in a quiet pocket of Cockatoo & is within walking distance to the shops, public transport & Cockatoo Primary School.
Set back off the road
with neat gardens framing the entrance, this surprisingly spacious split level home offers exposed beams, updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large dining room & 2 living areas.
There is gas ducted heating as well as a Wood Heater to the family room.
The covered entertaining area overlooks the flat back yard which has established trees, a garden shed, 3,000 litre water tank, plus the bonus of a double carport and plenty of off street parking!
This owner says it's time to sell, come along for an inspection today - this home must change hands!!!
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Delightful 3 Bedroom Home on Almost 1/3 Acre
Perfectly presented and located in a quiet street within walking distance to Cockatoo Primary School and the town centre is this lovely brick home offering a picture perfect garden setting on almost a 1/3 of an acre. This would have to be the perfect place to experience the lifestyle the beautiful hills have to offer. This home offers a large L shaped lounge & dining room with feature fire place, quality kitchen with meals area, GDH, air-conditioning, large windows allowing plenty of natural light to flow through & 3 bedrooms all with BIR's.
Outside you will discover a fully fenced allotment complete with large lock up garage, single carport, water feature, fruit trees, veggie patch & a large covered decked entertaining area which is the ideal place to entertain your family and friends. This one has something to suit everyone, Call today for an inspection, you won't be disappointed.
Justin O'Hehir : 0404 405 225

Easy living on almost a 1/4 acre
Set in a quiet location of cockatoo, on almost a 1/4 acre, is this gorgeous and well presented cedar weatherboard character home. With 2 bedrooms (both with built in robes), 1 bathroom and a large open plan living area, this home offers a quiet and cosy lifestyle. Features include reverse cycle air conditioning, ducted heating and a coonara to keep you comfortable all year round and a well appointed kitchen with dishwasher. Also on offer is a large rear deck that over looks the large open backyard and is a great place to relax and unwind at the end of the day. Whilst being within easy reach of public transport and the main town, this home still offers peace and easy living. Contact us today to inspect.
Photo ID Required
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Welcome To Paradise on Almost 2/3 Of an Acre
If there was ever an opportunity to secure a private home, in beautiful location that is perfectly nestled into its surrounds, this is it. On almost 2/3 of acre(2404m2), this near flat block boasts a private creek at the rear of the property, well established tree ferns, plenty of grassed area for the children to run around on and makes the perfect area for relaxation. The home is ideal for a family offering 4 bedrooms, modern kitchen with adjoining meals area, open plan lounge, plus the added bonus of an open study/rumpas room. Special features include gas ducted heating, air-conditioning and large windows so you can enjoy the sunlight at any time of year. Outside you will also discover a double carport and a large covered rear deck that is the perfect place to sit back and enjoy your own private paradise. With nothing to do except move in and enjoy, inspection is a must. Please call us today.
Photo ID Required
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Private, Peaceful and Picturesque Views on Over 2.2 Acres!
Sale by Set Date 4/4/2011
Set in a picture perfect setting on over 2 acres and offering peace and privacy is this magnificent character home that takes advantage of views extending over rolling pastures. With polished floor boards, exposed beams, newly renovated bathroom and large kitchen this home is sure to impress. The master bedroom offers a private deck that also overlooks the surrounding views and makes for the perfect parents retreat. The other two bedrooms are spacious with enough room for the kids to have their own play areas. Inside also features a coonara heater and split system while upstairs has both air conditioning and heating to ensure year round comfort. The rustic country feel is continued outside with a decked entertaining area, large fully fenced pony paddock, a large family play area and huge shed/workshop. With something for the whole family this property will not disappoint! Call to inspect today.
Photo ID Required
Justin O'Hehir : 0404 405 225

Peace And Privacy Assured On Over ½ An Acre
Situated on an elevated block this character weatherboard home has plenty of charm and space for the whole family.
Offering a balanced mix of original and modernised features, the home boasts a renovated kitchen with granite bench tops, dishwasher and freestanding stainless steel cooker.
The dining area has a cozy open fire place and overlooks the sunken lounge which has original double hung leadlight windows.
Parents can retreat at the end of the day in their large master bedroom which zoned off from the rest of the house and features polished floorboards, an amazing ensuite with corner shower, split system and a private view of the garden from the windows.
The remaining bedrooms are situated at the front of the house (fourth bedroom has external access to the garden) and have easy access to the family bathroom which comes complete with corner spa and shower.
There is over half an acre of established gardens that include rose gardens, fruit trees and multiple entertaining areas.
Also on offer is a double lock up garage with concrete floor and power, air conditioning and gas ducted heating throughout the home.
Call today, an inspection is a must!
Emma Sauvage : 0407 053 200

Spread your wings on over ¾ of an acre!!!
Set on a magnificent allotment of over 3/4 of an acre, sits this lovely well presented family home. The home offers plenty of space with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open plan lounge and dining and an adjoined timber kitchen. Special features include a double lock up garage and workshop under roofline, natural gas heating and a lovely veranda that is a great place to just sit back and enjoy peaceful location. Also on offer is a separate lock up garage and plenty of cleared open lawn space
Call today as inspection is a must.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781
